args.natural_language_statement: Suppose f : ùîª ‚Üí ùîª is holomorphic and f(0) = 0, then |f'(0)| ‚â§ 1.

import Mathlib

open Complex

theorem entire_zero_deriv (f : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ) (hf : Entire f) (h0 : f 0 = 0) : f' 0 = 0 := by sorry

{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Complex

/-- Let f : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ be entire and suppose f(0)=0. Then f'(0)=0. -/
theorem entire_zero_deriv (f : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ) (hf : AnalyticOn ‚ÑÇ f univ) (h0 : f 0 = 0) : deriv f 0 = 0 := by sorry"}

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Complex Metric

/-- Schwarz lemma: Suppose f maps the unit disk to itself, is holomorphic on the unit
ball and f(0) = 0. Then |f'(0)| ‚â§ 1. -/
theorem schwarz_lemma_unit_disk (f : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ)
  (hf : AnalyticOn ‚ÑÇ f (metric.ball (0 : ‚ÑÇ) 1))
  (h_map : ‚àÄ z, z ‚àà metric.ball (0 : ‚ÑÇ) 1 ‚Üí f z ‚àà metric.ball (0 : ‚ÑÇ) 1)
  (h0 : f 0 = 0) : Complex.abs (deriv f 0) ‚â§ 1 := by sorry
